competitors.name: Akamai
competitors.notes: Industry leader in CDN with vast global network, enterprise focus

competitors.name: Amazon CloudFront
competitors.notes: AWS CDN integrated with AWS ecosystem

competitors.name: Fastly
competitors.notes: Edge cloud platform with real-time capabilities

context: In 2020, Cloudflare was expanding beyond CDN into broader edge computing and security services. The company went public in September 2019. Main competitors included established players like Akamai and newer cloud-native options like Fastly. The pandemic accelerated demand for web performance and security services as digital traffic increased significantly. Cloudflare launched Workers KV and expanded its serverless edge computing offerings.
